entity.name: Hunt and Johnson's final public debate
entity.description: The Conservative leadership hopefuls are being grilled by readers of The Sun newspaper. It is the pair's last chance to debate each other in front of the general public before polls close. One of the two candidates will be named the prime minister of the UK within the next week.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@10DowningStreet OK then with the new era of 'transparency' will #DominicCummings allow #BorisJohnson to add EVERY SINGLE 'out of hospital' #COVID19 death to both the daily death count & the total death toll? Or has he already put in place a mechanism to completely manipulate them?
#wheresBoris
